description: Thread extraction: read thread messages and create reminders, checklists, and tickets

steps.description: Context command â€” sets project context

steps.userQuery: Extract action items from the thread. Thread ID is thread-abc. The project ID is extraction-test. Read the thread messages first, then create a reminder for the standup meeting, a checklist for the sprint tasks, and a ticket for the bug fix.
steps.description: Thread-extractor reads thread and creates artifacts

agentResponses.responseFallback:
I'll read the thread messages first and then extract the artifacts.

<tool_call>
{"name": "read_thread_messages", "args": {"threadId": "thread-abc"}}
</tool_call>

I found several action items. Let me create the artifacts.

<tool_call>
{"name": "create_reminder", "args": {"projectId": "extraction-test", "message": "Daily standup meeting at 10am", "type": "TIME_BASED", "triggerAt": "2026-03-01T10:00:00Z", "recurring": true, "intervalSeconds": 86400, "sourceThreadId": "thread-abc"}}
</tool_call>

Reminder created. Now creating the checklist.

<tool_call>
{"name": "create_checklist", "args": {"projectId": "extraction-test", "name": "Sprint 5 Tasks", "items": [{"text": "Review PR #42", "assignee": "Alice"}, {"text": "Update API docs"}, {"text": "Deploy to staging", "assignee": "Bob"}], "sourceThreadId": "thread-abc"}}
</tool_call>

Checklist created. Now creating the bug ticket.

<tool_call>
{"name": "create_ticket", "args": {"projectId": "extraction-test", "title": "Fix login timeout on slow connections", "description": "Users on slow connections experience login timeout after 5 seconds. Need to increase timeout to 30s and add retry logic.", "priority": "HIGH", "sourceThreadId": "thread-abc"}}
</tool_call>

Done! I extracted the following from thread-abc:
- 1 reminder: Daily standup meeting
- 1 checklist: Sprint 5 Tasks (3 items)
- 1 ticket: Fix login timeout (HIGH priority)

All artifacts are linked back to the source thread for traceability.
{"pass": true, "summary": "Thread-extractor successfully extracted 3 artifacts from thread"}
